/* PayslipSalaryDetailMapper.ListPayslipSalaryDetail */
SELECT PD.SALARY_ID, PD.PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS SALARY_TYPE_CODE_NAME, PD.SALARY_AMOUNT_CODE, CD2.CODE_NAME AS SALARY_AMOUNT_CODE_NAME, PD.SALARY_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP_SALARY_DETAIL PD LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'SALARY_TYPE_00' LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD2 ON CD2.CODE_VALUE = PD.SALARY_AMOUNT_CODE AND (CD2.UP_CODE_ID = 'SALARY_AMOUNT_A00' OR CD2.UP_CODE_ID = 'SALARY_AMOUNT_B00') WHERE PD.PAYSLIP_ID = ?PayslipId ORDER BY CD.CODE_ORDER, CD2.CODE_ORDER
